Dear Valued Customer,
With the Canada Post work disruption, we encourage you to sign up for e-Invoicing. It’s a convenient, paperless way to receive invoices on time so you don’t miss a payment or incur any possible late fees.
To set up your account for e-invoicing, please call us at 1-866-391-8111.
As a Grand & Toy account holder we are pleased to be able to offer you the option to remit payment electronically via electronic funds transfer (EFT), Direct Deposit or online banking (bank information below). Electronic payments reduce the risk of fraud, mail delays and reduce processing costs.
Bank Number: 004 Transit #: 10202 Account #: 5376525 Bank Name and Address: TD Bank, 55 King St W, Toronto, ON M5K 1A2 Email your remittance details to paymentprocessing@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:paymentprocessing@grandandtoy.com]]>
Please note, this Canada Post disruption doesn’t affect your deliveries. You can still expect your Grand & Toy items to show up on time and when you need them most.
Thank you for choosing Grand & Toy and we appreciate your business.
